mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dev_suggest (recruit_no, company_name, member_name, suggest_content, last_update) VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{companyName}, #{memberName}, #{suggestContent}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT recruit_no AS recruitNo, company_name AS companyName, member_name AS memberName, suggest_content AS suggestContent, last_update AS lastUpdate FROM dev_suggest WHERE member_name = #{memberName}
